#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem fixed direction camera.

=== Overview ===
A fixed direction camera moves so the target is always seen from the same point of view. 
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFixedDirectionCameraTightness(double camera_mode_ptr, double tightness) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFixedDirectionCameraDirection(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double y, double z) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetFixedDirectionCameraDistance(double camera_mode_ptr, double distance) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
